Hermes2D: Examples
==================

This section contains the description of selected `examples 
<http://git.hpfem.org/hermes.git/tree/HEAD:/hermes2d/examples>`_.
Its purpose is to complement rather than duplicate the information 
in the source code.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   examples/crack
   examples/bracket
   examples/thermoelasticity
   examples/saphir
   examples/iron-water
   examples/neutronics-4-group-adapt
   examples/waveguide
   examples/ns-timedep-adapt
   examples/ns-bearing
   examples/newton-np-timedep-adapt-system
   examples/singular-perturbation
   examples/linear-advection-diffusion
   examples/richards
   examples/richards-tracy-adapt
   examples/richards-seepage-adapt
